titleStmt.title: The Association, agreement, and protestation of the covnties of Cornwall, and Devon January 5, 1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, and John Bili ...,

notesStmt.note: An oath of allegiance to the King "taken by all men within two counties, above the age of sixteen yeers ..."--P. 1.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
